${ModID}:Aero.NAME: Aero DEPRECATED
${ModID}:Aero.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Draw !M! cards.

${ModID}:Ambush.NAME: Ambush
${ModID}:Ambush.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block twice. NL Deal !D! damage twice.

${ModID}:Anticipate.NAME: Anticipate
${ModID}:Anticipate.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! starlight:SP. NL starlight:Foretell and Upgrade a card in your discard pile.

${ModID}:Ascend.NAME: Ascend
${ModID}:Ascend.DESCRIPTION: starlight:Project 1 card in your hand. Gain [E] equal to its cost.

${ModID}:Astra.NAME: Astra
${ModID}:Astra.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !B! Block. NL starlight:Project !M! {!M!|1=copy|@=copies} of card in your hand.

${ModID}:AstralProtection.NAME: Astral Protection
${ModID}:AstralProtection.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you starlight:Project a card, gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:Augury.NAME: Augury
${ModID}:Augury.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL Draw and Upgrade !M! card{!M!|>1=s}.

${ModID}:Balance.NAME: Balance
${ModID}:Balance.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !M! additional damage for ALL your Status cards.

${ModID}:Banish.NAME: Banish
${ModID}:Banish.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Can be Upgraded any number of times.

${ModID}:BeatUp.NAME: Beat Up
${ModID}:BeatUp.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy has starlight:Jinx, deal !D! damage again.

${ModID}:Bio.NAME: Bio
${ModID}:Bio.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply Poison equal to unblocked damage dealt.

${ModID}:Blazing.NAME: Blazing
${ModID}:Blazing.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card. NL Gain starlight:SP equal to !M! times its cost.

${ModID}:Blessing.NAME: Blessing
${ModID}:Blessing.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain 10 starlight:Providence, draw !M! cards.

${ModID}:BlindSide.NAME: Blind Side
${ModID}:BlindSide.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL Apply starlight:Jinx equal to unblocked damage dealt.

${ModID}:CriticalHit.NAME: Critical Hit
${ModID}:CriticalHit.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Damage modification affects this card twice.

${ModID}:Culminate.NAME: Culminate
${ModID}:Culminate.DESCRIPTION: Increase the damage of all Attacks in your hand by !M! this combat.

${ModID}:Dark.NAME: Dark
${ModID}:Dark.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Ignores Block. NL If this kills an enemy, gain [E] [E].

${ModID}:Dia.NAME: Dia
${ModID}:Dia.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! starlight:Jinx to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:DivineSense.NAME: Divine Sense
${ModID}:DivineSense.DESCRIPTION: starlight:Foretell !M! cards in your discard pile. They cost 0 until played. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:DizzyStrike.NAME: Dizzy Strike
${ModID}:DizzyStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL Shuffle a Dazed into your draw pile.{!Starlight:IsSisters!|1= NL starlight:Swap.}{@@}

${ModID}:Doomsday.NAME: Doomsday
${ModID}:Doomsday.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies X{!M!|>0= + !M!} times. NL If starlight:Foretold, increase this card's hits by 1 this combat.

${ModID}:Echo.NAME: Echo
${ModID}:Echo.DESCRIPTION: starlight:Project a copy of the last Attack played this combat.

${ModID}:Enlighten.NAME: Enlighten
${ModID}:Enlighten.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !B! Block. NL When you draw this card, gain {!M!|1=[E]|2=[E] [E]|3=[E] [E] [E]|@=!M! [E]}.

${ModID}:Fire.NAME: Fire
${ModID}:Fire.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Increase this card's damage by !M! this combat.

${ModID}:Fortify.NAME: Fortify
${ModID}:Fortify.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Retain. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}.

${ModID}:Fortuna.NAME: Fortuna
${ModID}:Fortuna.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain Energy, gain !M! starlight:Providence.
${ModID}:Fortuna.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you gain Energy, gain !M! starlight:Providence.

${ModID}:FutureSight.NAME: Future Sight DEPRECATED
${ModID}:FutureSight.DESCRIPTION: Scry !M!. NL starlight:Project the top card of your draw pile.

${ModID}:Gank.NAME: Gank
${ModID}:Gank.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you starlight:Swap, return this from the discard pile to your hand.

${ModID}:Gravity.NAME: Gravity
${ModID}:Gravity.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL starlight:SP affects this card !M! times.

${ModID}:Grit.NAME: Grit
${ModID}:Grit.DESCRIPTION: Play a random card in your draw pile and Exhaust it. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Haste.NAME: Haste
${ModID}:Haste.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, NL gain {!M!|1=[E]|2=[E] [E]|3=[E] [E] [E]|@=!M! [E]} and draw !M! additional card{!M!|>1=s}.

${ModID}:Holy.NAME: Holy
${ModID}:Holy.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals double damage in Elite and Boss combats.

${ModID}:Imperil.NAME: Imperil
${ModID}:Imperil.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable.

${ModID}:Incantation.NAME: Incantation DEPRECATED
${ModID}:Incantation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you Scry, gain !M! starlight:SP.

${ModID}:MagickConduit.NAME: Magick Conduit DEPRECATED
${ModID}:MagickConduit.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !M! starlight:SP for each starlight:Magick card in your draw pile.{!Location!|0= (Gain !Starlight:M2! starlight:SP)} NL starlight:{!Starlight:IsSisters!|1=Tag_Team|0=Attack_Tag}: Gain [E].

${ModID}:ManaConversion.NAME: Mana Conversion
${ModID}:ManaConversion.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain Energy, gain !M! starlight:SP.
${ModID}:ManaConversion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you gain Energy, gain !M! starlight:Providence.

${ModID}:Meteor.NAME: Meteor
${ModID}:Meteor.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Deals double damage if starlight:Projected.

${ModID}:NastyNastySpell.NAME: Nasty Nasty Spell
${ModID}:NastyNastySpell.DESCRIPTION: {@@}This turn, your next {!M!|>1=!M! }starlight:Magick card{!M!|>1=s} {!M!|1=is|@=are} played twice.

${ModID}:NullMomentum.NAME: Null Momentum
${ModID}:NullMomentum.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Put a Void onto the top of your draw pile. NL Draw !M! cards.

${ModID}:Posturing.NAME: Posturing
${ModID}:Posturing.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, if the last card played was a... NL Skill: Gain !M! Block. NL Attack: Gain !M! Vigor.

${ModID}:PowerFist.NAME: Power Fist
${ModID}:PowerFist.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !M! additional damage for ALL your Power Fist cards.

${ModID}:Prepare.NAME: Prepare
${ModID}:Prepare.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! starlight:SP.{!Starlight:IsSisters!|1= NL starlight:Swap.}

${ModID}:Protect.NAME: Protect
${ModID}:Protect.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL starlight:Foretell the next card you play this turn.

${ModID}:Quake.NAME: Quake
${ModID}:Quake.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Reduce this card's cost by !M! this combat.

${ModID}:RealityPassage.NAME: Reality Passage
${ModID}:RealityPassage.DESCRIPTION: {@@}starlight:Foretell !M! card{!M!|>1=s} in your discard pile. NL Gain 1 starlight:Providence for each card starlight:Foretold this combat.

${ModID}:Reflect.NAME: Reflect
${ModID}:Reflect.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Whenever you are attacked this turn, deal !M! damage back.

${ModID}:RejectFate.NAME: Reject Fate DEPRECATED
${ModID}:RejectFate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies twice. NL Scry !M!.

${ModID}:Serendipity.NAME: Serendipity
${ModID}:Serendipity.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !B! Block.{!Starlight:IsSisters!|1= NL starlight:Swap.}{@@}

${ModID}:SetAside.NAME: Set Aside DEPRECATED
${ModID}:SetAside.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}. NL Discard !M! card{!M!|>1=s}.{@@}

${ModID}:Shell.NAME: Shell
${ModID}:Shell.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Block is not removed at the start of your next turn.

${ModID}:ShuffleStrike.NAME: Shuffle Strike DEPRECATED
${ModID}:ShuffleStrike.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}. NL Whenever this enters your draw pile, add it into your hand.

${ModID}:Skyfall.NAME: Skyfall
${ModID}:Skyfall.DESCRIPTION: {@@}starlight:Project the top card of your draw pile. NL Deal !D! damage for each starlight:Projected card.

${ModID}:SpellOptimizer.NAME: Spell Optimizer
${ModID}:SpellOptimizer.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL starlight:Magick cards drawn this way cost 1 less this turn.

${ModID}:SpellScribe.NAME: Spell Scribe
${ModID}:SpellScribe.DESCRIPTION: The first starlight:Magick card you play each turn costs 0.

${ModID}:SpellWeaver.NAME: Spell Weaver
${ModID}:SpellWeaver.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 random starlight:Magick cards to add into your hand. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:SpellWeaver.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 random starlight:Magick cards to add into your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Star.NAME: Star
${ModID}:Star.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL starlight:Project !M! card{!M!|>1s} in your hand.

${ModID}:StarChart.NAME: Star Chart
${ModID}:StarChart.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !B! Block. NL Add !M! starlight:Star_Shard{!M!|>1=s} into your hand.

${ModID}:StarShard.NAME: Star Shard
${ModID}:StarShard.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Stockpile.NAME: Stockpile
${ModID}:Stockpile.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !M! Block whenever you play a Skill this turn.

${ModID}:Supply.NAME: Supply
${ModID}:Supply.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! starlight:SP. NL Gain !M! Vigor.{!Starlight:IsSisters!|1= NL starlight:Swap.}{@@}

${ModID}:Surmount.NAME: Surmount
${ModID}:Surmount.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! starlight:Providence. NL Next turn, gain [E].

${ModID}:Swindle.NAME: Swindle
${ModID}:Swindle.DESCRIPTION: Apply 1 Vulnerable. NL Put !M! random Attacks from your draw pile into your hand.

${ModID}:ThePlot.NAME: The Plot
${ModID}:ThePlot.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}. NL starlight:Foretell a card in your hand. It costs 0 until played.

${ModID}:Thoughtbloom.NAME: Thoughtbloom
${ModID}:Thoughtbloom.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a starlight:Magick card, gain !M! starlight:SP.

${ModID}:Thrash.NAME: Thrash
${ModID}:Thrash.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you starlight:Swap, increase this card's damage by !M! this combat.

${ModID}:Transcribe.NAME: Transcribe
${ModID}:Transcribe.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Add a copy of the last starlight:Magick card played this combat into your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn.

${ModID}:TwinForm.NAME: Twin Form
${ModID}:TwinForm.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL starlight:Project a copy of the first card you play each turn.
${ModID}:TwinForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: starlight:Project a copy of the first card you play each turn.

${ModID}:WildMagick.NAME: Wild Magick
${ModID}:WildMagick.DESCRIPTION: Play a random starlight:Magick card from your draw pile.
